actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965.

summary.text: Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to extend eligibility for Golden Age Passports (Lifetime admission permits for designated units of the National Park System) to include persons 60 years of age or older and blind and disabled persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965.
